content: As an AI language model, I do not have knowledge of current events or recent developments. However, in general, the Speaker of the House in Georgia plays a significant role in the budgeting process. The Speaker of the House is the presiding officer of the Georgia House of Representatives and has the power to appoint members to key committees, including the appropriations committee, which is responsible for developing the state budget. The Speaker also has the ability to influence the budget by prioritizing certain programs or initiatives and advocating for them during the appropriations process. Additionally, the Speaker works closely with the Governor's office and Senate leadership to negotiate the final budget and ensure it is passed by the deadline.
